infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location Tracker needs access to location to track your movements for location history.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Location Tracker needs access to location to track your movements even when the app is in background for continuous tracking.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Location Tracker needs access to location to track your movements in background for continuous location monitoring.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow User Tracking to use your location for tracking purposes.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow User Tracking to use your location in the background for continuous tracking.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow User Tracking to access your photos to upload profile images.
